name: base-file-highlight
description: Highlights files with no local dependencies (installed packages only)

baseFileHighlight.highlightColor.description: Color to highlight base files (files with no local dependencies). Use hex color codes like #98FF98 for mint green.

baseFileHighlight.useSymbol.description: Use a symbol indicator instead of text color to avoid conflicts with compiler errors.

baseFileHighlight.symbolColor.description: Color for the symbol indicator when useSymbol is enabled.

baseFileHighlight.enabled.description: Enable or disable base file highlighting.

baseFileHighlight.fileExtensions.description: File extensions to analyze for dependencies.
